===Etymology===
This position was established in the [[w:Qin Dynasty|Qin Dynasty]]. The post was originally filled by either a scholar official or a [[eunuch]]. During the [[w:Han Dynasty|Eastern Han Dynasty]], the post was exclusively held by [[eunuch]]s. They were entrusted with the task of delivering imperial edicts, and the handling of documents. By the end of the [[w:Han Dynasty|Han Dynasty]], [[eunuch]]s were no longer used for this position. From that point forward, the post was held by scholar officials.
